description.value: You can remove conditions with divine grace. You can sacrifice one @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] spell you've prepared in your extra slots from your healing font to cast one of the following spells instead: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cleanse Affliction], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clear Mind], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sound Body], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sound Footing]. The spell is heightened to the same rank as the spell you sacrificed.
